nodes.name: Problem
nodes.query: Please describe the problem studied in this paper, including its significance and applications

output_schema.description: The problem studied in this paper

item.name: name
item.description: A short name of the problem.

item.name: description
item.description: A detailed description of the problem.

item.name: significance
item.description: The value of studying the problem, any applications and impact.

nodes.name: ExistingWorks
nodes.query: What are the most relevant existing works of this problem, and what are the detailed issues of existing works mentioned in the paper to this problem.

output_schema.description: The existing work of the problem studied in this paper.

item.name: description
item.description: The detailed description of the solutions of the work.

nodes.name: Contribution
nodes.query: List all contributions of the paper. These contributions are always organized and listed with a head sentence like **our contributions are as follows**. For each contribution, output the **original representation** and use a few words to summarize it.

nodes.name: Challenge
nodes.query: Please summarize some challenges in this paper. Each challenge has a summarized NAME, detailed DESCRIPTION, and SOLUTION.

output_schema.description: A list of challenges for the problems and their solutions in the paper.

item.name: name
item.description: The summarized name of the challenge.

item.name: solution
item.description: The solutions proposed for the challenge.

nodes.name: Solution
nodes.query: Please present details of solutions that are proposed to solve the challenges in this paper. The solution can include system design, components of systems and algorithm details. Include as many details as possible for each solution.

output_schema.description: A list of solutions for the problem in this paper.

item.name: name
item.description: The summarized name of the solution.

item.name: description
item.description: The detailed description of the solution.

nodes.name: Experiment
nodes.query: Please analyze details of experiments in this paper. The experiments are usually organized in a section named **Experiment** or **Evaluation**. Each experiment is typically a subsection of the whole experiment section. List each experiment with the name, settings including datasets, evaluation metrics, and baselines, and the results of the experiment. Provide the authors' analysis of the results, explaining why such results might have been observed and any implications. In addition, analysis for special cases can also be explained.

output_schema.description: A list of experiments in this paper.

item.name: settings
item.description: The settings of the experiment, including datasets, evaluation metrics, and baselines.

item.name: results
item.description: The results and their analysis of the experiment.
